0.1.name: wordpress/cpt-archive
0.1.description:
A modified version of the default Archives widget to let the user specify a custom post type rather than 'post', and also allows of choice or yearly or monthly archives.

Requires WordPress 3.1, and the custom post type must have archives enabled, e.g., for a post type named 'press-release', args would include 'has_archive' => 'press-release'.

More information can be found at the plugin website

Current Features

  • Choose custom post type for archive widget
  • Choose monthly or yearly archive
